description: This file contains utility functions for number formatting, percentage calculation, and value clamping, used within the healthify frontend project.

methods.name: number
methods.description: Formats a value as a fixed-point number with specified digits, defaulting to 0.

methods.name: percent
methods.description: Converts a number to a percentage string with no decimal digits.

methods.name: clamp
methods.description: Restricts a number within the specified min and max bounds (default 0 and 100).

ctags.name: clamp
ctags.pattern: /^export const clamp = (n, min=0, max=100) => Math.max(min, Math.min(max, n));$/
